forumNotes.author: Weber
forumNotes.content:
Hello,  
I used winbuilder 080 creating a Win 7 PE Live DVD. It works very fine but not WLAN.  
I used PENetwork-Tool, installed the T-Sinus 111 Card-Driver (PCMCIA) manually and find out how to get a connection to my router FritzBox7113 (Symbol appeared).  
But the Opera Browser does not work. (with LAN connection it works properly)  
Another problem: After hardware installation, system often crashes (blue screen).  
What's wrong?  
With Winbuilder 082 is there better WLAN support?  
Have Anyone un idea?  
Thanks
